Reviews.Title: A great buy!
Reviews.Author: Annette Tucker "xapod"
Reviews.Content: I shopped a long time for this camera. It is a great Nikon - easy to use with terrific pictures. This dealer offered the best price by far and delivered the product on time and very carefully packed. Since this purchase I have purchased another product from the same seller. You can't go wrong!

Reviews.Title: my new toy
Reviews.Author: Astrid
Reviews.Content: I admit I am a novice. I love the simplicity of using this camera. I read everything about this camera and cannot wait for any available time to use it. Although there are people who say the color is hideous, I love it. I look firward to msny many years of use.
